sentences.en: A long , loose outer garment, as that worn by artists and craftspeople ; a smock.
sentences.cn: (英国)脏活时穿在普通衣服外的一种宽松的保护性工作服.

sentences.en: Inevitably, under such a system, there will be craftspeople working for very little money, she says.
sentences.cn: 不可避免的是, 在这样的体制下, 有些艺人的劳作只能换取微薄的收入, 她说.

trans.tran_en: Craftspeople are people who make things skilfully with their hands
